headline: Of All Trump’s Defenses, This Is the Lamest
abstract: Only the voters can send the president packing? That’s a joke.
lead_paragraph: Once the Senate concludes its trial of President Trump, it should go into recess. Until next January. The House, too. Lawmakers shouldn’t pass legislation, consider nominations or make any important decisions whatsoever: This is an election year, and the voters will soon weigh in on the direction of America. The nation’s business should await that judgment, lest members of Congress contradict it.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
